data.title: Jaguar E Pace Review | Cost, Features, Models, Reliability & Lots More
data.meta_description: Let's explore the Jaguar E Pace, from how much they cost, what they can fit inside, models, boot space, how they differ from the F Pace  & lots, lots more
data.text:
With the brand-new Jaguar E-Pace you are getting a high performance All Wheel Drive, Front Wheel Drive, or a Four Wheel Drive compact SUV that has a sports car styling to it. As a result, it gives you a very eye-catching look with its sculpted bonnet to its muscular rear quarters that give you a very good driving experience on the whole; the E-PACE is every inch a Jaguar – its bold exterior design is complemented by a cabin that is focused on comfort and refinement with technology at its heart.

Not only is it a striking-looking SUV however, the E Pace comes full of practicality, large load space and class-leading interior stowage to add to its ever-growing appeal.

When it comes to design, the rear of the E Pace has been designed with a new bumper that gives it a sporty feel, paired with a modern, carefully crafted interior using leather and high-quality finishes and a new ergonomically designed drive selector.

The interior is then finished off with the new Privi Pro Infotainment system that features an 11.4-inch touch responsive screen with configurable ambient lighting.

Consequently, in our review, you will explore the Jaguar E Pace from its looks to cost, PHEV and diesel engines and lots more.

What can a Jaguar E Pace tow?

This Jaguar SUV can tow up from 1,600 kg to 2,000 KG in weight. This should be enough to tow 6 to 8 berth caravans, most trailers, or horse boxes with ease.

That said, always check the weight of the item you are planning on towing. with the exact engine size of the Jaguar E Pace you are buying prior to purchase.

The Jaguar E Pace has even won awards for its towing ability, claiming the 1,900 kg+ towing category from the Tow Car Awards.

What engines are available does the E Pace have?

Making the most of new hybrid advances, there is a wide range of engines on offer, from the exhilaration afforded by the 4-cylinder 300PS engine of the formidable E-PACE 300 SPORT to the extra efficiency of the new E-PACE Plug-in Hybrid that provides phenomenal fuel economy on long journeys together with the option of zero-emission motoring and fully electric mode for shorter trips or commutes.

Top Speed

The Jaguar E Pace can reach a top speed of up to 143 MPH and accelerate from 0 to 62 mph in 6.5 to 10.5 seconds, depending on the engine you choose. This is in part due to the 307 V lithium-ion battery on the PHEV models, which can provide near-instance torque when needed for the electric vehicle variants of this SUV.

Buying a new of Used Jaguar E-Pace

Buying a new or used Jaguar E-PACE offers offers you many benefits. For instance, as you can see, the brand-new E-PACE gives you a very good-looking design with advanced technology, which makes every drive enjoyable.

New models also come with the latest features and a full manufacturer’s warranty, ensuring you get peace of mind for years to come as a result. Buying a used E-PACE can be more affordable while still providing you with the luxury and performance the car has become renowned for.

Approved Used Jaguar E-Paces are also thoroughly inspected and come with extended warranties and roadside assistance as well. So whether new or used, the Jaguar E-PACE will give you a car that delivers on style, comfort, and reliability, making it a popular choice for any driver as consequence.

How many miles will a Jaguar E Pace PHEV last?

If you are wondering what the range of the Jaguar E Pace Hybrid model is, look no further. The Jaguar E Pace Hybrid can deliver on its electric engine only a range of 39 miles on a full charge and before the traditional fuel engine needs to kick in.

What does the E in E Pace mean?

Looking for what the E means in Jaguar E-Pace?

It doesn't mean anything specific. It's Jaguar's naming convention for their models, similar to Audi's naming conventions of the A's such as: Audi A1, Audi A3, or Audi A4 line up for their ranges.

Who Is Sinclair Jaguar?

Here at Sinclair Jaguar, we are a prominent number of authorised Jaguar Retailers and car dealerships across South Wales in the United Kingdom. Consequently, we are known for offering you a wide range of new Jaguars and used Jaguar cars, as well as being able to offer you part exchanges, and as a Credit Broker who is regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority, so are able to also offer you car finance options as well.

Consequently, due to our large size, we can provide you with exceptional customer service, expert maintenance and repair services, and a variety of financing options to cater to diverse needs.

Sinclair Audi is part of the Sinclair Group, which has a long-standing reputation for providing high quality service in the automotive industry as well.

If you are not sure if this premium SUV is the right car for you, please contact our us today, and our dedicated team of Jaguar specialists are on hand to answer any questions you may still have and to even book you in for a test drive from one of our local dealerships near you.
